title: 151 Reliable, All-Purpose Wall Paper Paste, Hangs Up To 5 Rolls
features: QUICK 3 MINUTE MIX, SUPER STRONG: 151 Wallpaper Paste, mix easily & quickly in only 3 minutes to a smooth consistency. Perfect for all makeovers and wallpaper refreshes around the home
PASTE FOR ALL PAPERS: 151 Wallpaper Paste can be used for all types of wallpapers including lining papers, washable, vinyl, textured and blown vinyl, embossed and heavy embossed wallpapers

SUPER STRONG WALLPAPER PASTE: 151 Wallpaper Paste, perfect when you have chosen your latest home wallpaper, new paper to refresh or update a room. 151 Wallpaper Paste is easy to mix and apply. Home wall makeovers made easy!
DIY WALLPAPER ADHESIVE: 151 Wallpaper Paste, strong wallpaper adhesive, reliable long lasting results. Suitable for a wide range of wallpapers
ABOUT THE PRODUCT. Ready to mix wallpaper paste. Hangs up to 5 rolls. Store at room temperature
description: From the manufacturer Step-By-Step Guide - Quick Mix in 3 Minutes! Step 1 - Mix Paste with Water Open sachet at the corner and sprinkle into water (as instructed in the table provided). Stir briskly for 30 seconds to ensure dispersion. Stir occasionally and use after approximately 3 minutes. Step 2 - Apply Paste to Wallpaper Apply paste to the back of the wallpaper. Ensure paper is evenly covered with a generous coat of adhesive. FOR BEST RESULTS: Apply with a brush or roller. Step 3 - Place Wallpaper on Wall Place wallpaper onto wall, and adjust accordingly to get into the correct position. Leave to dry. Always refer to wallpaper manufacturers label for specific hanging instructions Step 4 - Gently Wipe Excess Paste Gently wipe excess paste with a clean damp cloth. Take care around the edges, and make sure not to rub, as this could cause the wallpaper to tear. 151 Wallpaper Paste (6 Pints) 151 Wallpaper Paste (12 Pints) Add To Basket Add To Basket Customer Reviews 4.4 out of 5 stars 409 4.6 out of 5 stars 2,981 Price £2.98 £ 2 . 98 £3.49 £ 3 . 49 Hangs up to 5 Rolls 10 Rolls
